languages.text: "Вы пошли на поводу у неблагонадежного сброда, более того — вложили оружие им в руки. Теперь у нас не просто ненадежная чернь в трюме, а чернь вооруженная. В следующий раз они поднимут куда более кровопролитное восстание — если, конечно, раньше по дури не перестреляют друг друга".

"You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."
languages.original_text: "Вы пошли на поводу у неблагонадежного сброда, более того — вложили оружие им в руки. Теперь у нас не просто ненадежная чернь в трюме, а чернь вооруженная. В следующий раз они поднимут куда более кровопролитное восстание — если, конечно, раньше по дури не перестреляют друг друга".

traits.locale_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."

Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “您对那些心怀不轨的乌合之众卑躬屈膝。更糟糕的是，您还把武器交到了他们手里。如今，我们的船上不仅仅有一伙不值得信任的暴民，还是一伙武装起来的暴民。等他们下次再发起叛乱时，情况只会变得更加血腥。当然，前提是他们没有自相残杀，全都死光。”
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."

traits.locale_text: “您对那些心怀不轨的乌合之众卑躬屈膝。更糟糕的是，您还把武器交到了他们手里。如今，我们的船上不仅仅有一伙不值得信任的暴民，还是一伙武装起来的暴民。等他们下次再发起叛乱时，情况只会变得更加血腥。当然，前提是他们没有自相残杀，全都死光。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Se ha doblegado ante una turba desleal y, lo que es peor, les ha entregado armas. Ahora ya no solo tenemos una caterva traicionera en la bahía, sino una muchedumbre armada. La próxima vez que decidan rebelarse, el resultado será mucho más sangriento... suponiendo, por supuesto, que no acaben matándose entre ellos antes».
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha doblegado ante una turba desleal y, lo que es peor, les ha entregado armas. Ahora ya no solo tenemos una caterva traicionera en la bahía, sino una muchedumbre armada. La próxima vez que decidan rebelarse, el resultado será mucho más sangriento... suponiendo, por supuesto, que no acaben matándose entre ellos antes».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「不誠実な暴徒たちに屈服し…さらに悪いことに、武器を持たせてしまった。今、我らは単に信用できない暴徒を抱えているのではなく、武装した暴徒を抱えているのです。今度、彼らが蜂起を決断すれば、きっとさらなる流血が巻き起こるでしょう…もちろん、その前に誤って自滅しなければの話ですが」
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."

traits.locale_text: 「不誠実な暴徒たちに屈服し…さらに悪いことに、武器を持たせてしまった。今、我らは単に信用できない暴徒を抱えているのではなく、武装した暴徒を抱えているのです。今度、彼らが蜂起を決断すれば、きっとさらなる流血が巻き起こるでしょう…もちろん、その前に誤って自滅しなければの話ですが」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt vor dem untreuen Pöbel gebuckelt. Schlimmer noch, ihr habt ihnen Waffen in die Hand gegeben. Nun haben wir nicht mehr einfach einen nicht vertrauenswürdigen Mob an Bord, er ist auch noch bewaffnet. Wenn sie das nächste Mal einen Aufstand anzetteln, wird er viel blutiger sein. Falls sie sich nicht vorher versehentlich selbst auslöschen."
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt vor dem untreuen Pöbel gebuckelt. Schlimmer noch, ihr habt ihnen Waffen in die Hand gegeben. Nun haben wir nicht mehr einfach einen nicht vertrauenswürdigen Mob an Bord, er ist auch noch bewaffnet. Wenn sie das nächste Mal einen Aufstand anzetteln, wird er viel blutiger sein. Falls sie sich nicht vorher versehentlich selbst auslöschen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vous vous êtes {mf|écrasé|écrasée} devant un ramassis de rebelles sans aveu. Pire encore, vous leur avez donné des armes. Non {mf|content|contente} d'avoir une horde de mutins dans la cale, vous leur avez fourni les moyens de nous livrer une guerre ouverte. La prochaine fois qu'ils décideront de se révolter, nous aurons droit à un bain de sang... à condition toutefois qu'ils ne s'entretuent pas avant. »
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous êtes {mf|écrasé|écrasée} devant un ramassis de rebelles sans aveu. Pire encore, vous leur avez donné des armes. Non {mf|content|contente} d'avoir une horde de mutins dans la cale, vous leur avez fourni les moyens de nous livrer une guerre ouverte. La prochaine fois qu'ils décideront de se révolter, nous aurons droit à un bain de sang... à condition toutefois qu'ils ne s'entretuent pas avant. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Hainlerin laflarına kandınız. Daha kötüsü, ellerine silah verdiniz. Şimdi elimizde güvenilmez bir güruhtan ziyade silahlı bir güruh var. Tekrar isyan etmeye kalkıştıklarında çok daha fazla kan dökecekler. Tabii önce kendi soylarını tüketmezlerse."
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble — worse still, you put weapons into their hands. Now we do not simply have an untrustworthy mob in the hold, we have a mob that is armed. Next time they decide to start an uprising, it will be far bloodier — that is, of course, if they don't accidentally wipe themselves out first."

traits.locale_text: "Hainlerin laflarına kandınız. Daha kötüsü, ellerine silah verdiniz. Şimdi elimizde güvenilmez bir güruhtan ziyade silahlı bir güruh var. Tekrar isyan etmeye kalkıştıklarında çok daha fazla kan dökecekler. Tabii önce kendi soylarını tüketmezlerse."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
